articles.description: Follow build-up and team news as Manchester City visit Burnley on the opening night of the 2023-24 Premier League season.
articles.title: Premier League: Build-up as champions Man City visit Burnley in opener

articles.description: Liverpool agree a British record transfer fee of £111m with Brighton for Ecuador midfielder Moises Caicedo.
articles.title: Liverpool agree £111m fee with Brighton for Caicedo

articles.description: A stunning catch from Ross Whiteley helps Oval Invincibles edge out Northern Superchargers in The Hundred men's competition.
articles.title: Stunning Whiteley catch helps Invincibles stretch lead at top

articles.description: England captain Harry Kane is set to have a medical at Bayern Munich after being given permission to travel to Germany by Tottenham.
articles.title: Tottenham's Kane to have Bayern medical

articles.description: England must face Colombia in the Women's World Cup quarter-final without suspended top-scorer Lauren James, but they have a plan according to manager Sarina Wiegman.
articles.title: England have Colombia plan without James - Wiegman

articles.description: Highlights from day two of the final women’s major of the year.
articles.title: Golf: Women's Open - 2023: Day 2

articles.description: Watch a stunning catch from Ross Whiteley to help Oval Invincibles edge out Northern Superchargers in The Hundred.
articles.title: Watch Whiteley's 'unbelievable' catch to help Invincibles win

articles.description: Match of the Day pundit Alan Shearer is not expecting Newcastle to repeat their top-four finish from last season, but feels Manchester City are still the team to beat at the top.
articles.title: 'Newcastle need another miracle this season'

articles.description: Anthony Joshua exchanges words with stand-in opponent Robert Helenius at an intense weigh-in ahead of Saturday's heavyweight fight in London.
articles.title: Fired-up Joshua weighs in for Helenius fight

articles.description: Phoebe Litchfield makes a brilliant 68 from 45 balls as Northern Superchargers beat Oval Invincibles in The Hundred and move to within a point of top spot.
articles.title: Classy Litchfield sets up Superchargers victory
